title: Man Rowing Boat

verbs: To traverse or travel by ship on a body of water.
Traverse or travel on (a body of water)
To be impelled or driven forward by the action of wind upon sails, as a ship on water; to be impelled on a body of water by steam or other power.
nouns: A small boat of shallow draft with cross thwarts for seats and rowlocks for oars with which it is propelled
An open boat propelled by pulling oars through the water.
Rowing is the act of propelling a boat using the motion of oars in the water.
A small open boat, propelled by oars or paddles, carried as a tender, lifeboat, or pleasure craft on a ship.
Act of propelling a boat using the motion of oars in the water
A small open boat propelled by oars (by rowing).
Small boat that is rowed.
The dory is a small, shallow-draft boat, about long.
Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
An adult male human.
A man is a male human.
An adult male human
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)
A boat is a watercraft, usually smaller than most ships.
A watercraft designed to float or plane on, and provide transport over water.
A boat is a watercraft of any size designed to float or plane, to work or travel on water.
Watercraft
A small vessel for travel on water

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the man rowing boat emoji depicts a solitary figure with a determined expression, expertly navigating a sleek, wooden rowboat across calm waters.  The Apple design imbues the scene with smooth gradients and realistic water reflections, highlighting the polished wood of the boat and the dynamic posture of the rower.  This emoji conveys a sense of effort, perseverance, journey, or a peaceful, solitary aquatic adventure, often used to signify personal progress or outdoor activities.
